author: kareemb
title: A Second-Chance Cardano Hub
description: Ex-Offenders are locked out of many ways to earn a good living. ~77% of former prisoners are rearrested in five years.
solution: Development on blockchains offers a fresh start way to earn money and contribute. We will host a Cardano hub inside of our program @ 1426.
experience:
Entrepreneur, mentor, 15-year Fortune 50 Supply Chain leader. 
I volunteer at Weld. We have the space and will have the infrastructure.
